entry.title: Date Night
entry.summary:
Author: WhatsAComicBook

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,270Chapters: 3/4Kudos: 15

Summary: "What have you done?" shouted a horrified voice. Batman looked up and saw Superman hovering there. He had come to Gotham for their weekly date night. Batman had been so busy that he'd forgotten about his boyfriend."She was a metahuman in my city," said Batman, like this was something that made sense and not a completely deranged mindset for someone to have. "There are no metahumans allowed in Gotham.""What are you talking about?" cried Superman. "Gotham is an American city and you have no right to say someone isn't allowed to live here. Besides, it has a long history of metahuman protectors. Alan Scott has been here before you were even born, and Dinah used to live here too, and there's also--"Batman was annoyed. He was pretty sure No Metahumans In Gotham was canon, but he'd never actually read a comic book so he couldn't prove it. All his information came from TikToks and tumblr posts. Was it possible he'd beaten a woman to a pulp based on poorly thought-out headcanons? Luckily, he had a fallback. "I'm the richest man in Gotham and that means it's my city and I decide how it operates."
